tool_description: API that gets all the news titles and urls currently appearing on The New York Times (NYT) web.
name: NY Times News Titles and URLs
title: NY Times News Titles and URLs
tool_name: NY Times News Titles and URLs

api_list.name: news
api_list.description: Gets a dictionary with all news titles and urls sorted by category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ny-times-news-titles-and-urls.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ny-times-news-titles-and-urls.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ny-times-news-titles-and-urls.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ny-times-news-titles-and-urls.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
